children.name: Ishmael
children.decription: The sons of Ishmael became the heads of twelve tribes

children.name: Eliphaz
children.decription: The ancestor of the tribes of Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, and Amalek.

children.name: Reuel
children.decription: The ancestor of the tribes of Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

children.name: Jacob
children.decription: Ancestor of the twelve great tribes of Israel

children.name: Er
children.decription: Was so evil that the Lord killed him.

children.name: Nahshon
children.decription: A prominent man of the tribe of Judah.

children.name: Shevah
children.decription: Founded the towns of Machbenah and Gibea.

children.name: Segub
children.mother: Machir's daughter, the sister of Gilead

children.name: Jair
children.decription: Ruled twenty-three cities in the territory of Gilead.

children.name: Crete
children.decription: From whom the Philistines were descended

children.name: Canaan
children.decription: The ancestor of the Jebusites, the Amorites, Girgashites, Hivites, Arkites, Sinites, Arvadites, Zemarites, and Hamathites.
